attributes.action: prevent chatham south school and medway community college from merging!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Two schools. One has a brilliant ofsted report and one does not. My eldest daughter will go to this school in year 11. It is a disruption. All year sevens should attend this school beginning in 2010 and thereafter. Our childrens school life should not be disrupted...
